content: NPU Knockout draw studs (7/16” to 1-1/8”) Knockout punch draw studs for punching ½ - 4” diameter conduit holes in up to 10-gauge steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Knockout tool inserts ### FEATURES:Features Improve punching accuracy and productivity – alignment markings help you position the hole precisely Clean-cut holes – engineered to deliver a clean edge when used with Hilti cordless knockout punch tools, dies, and punches Wide diameter range – combine with die and punch versions to punch ½” up to 4” diameter conduit holes Applications Punching conduit holes in mild steel up to 10 gauge Punching conduit holes in stainless steel up to 12 gauge ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2355261 - Draw stud NPU S 1-1/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2196407 - Draw stud NPU S 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Punching NPU S 3/4 Stud bolt - 2196406 - Draw stud NPU S 7/16 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Punching NPU S 7/16 Stud bolt
